text: Redisclosure of any mental health information disclosed pursuant to this subchapter shall be governed by order of the court or, if no order is issued, by the rules of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
historical:

DC CODE § 7-1204.04

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
